input.sentences: the smiths are having a family reunion .
the whole family has come out for a fun time today .
they are having some drinks and chatting about old times .
the night was so long that [male] passed out from all of the fun .
he even passed out on the car ride home .
output.sentences: A group of people sit at a table with food and drinks.
Someone in the group wearing a yellow shirt reaches over the table.
A woman sits with at the table lifting a red cup to her mouth.
A guy in a green shirt with blue designs falls asleep in front of a tree.
The same guy in the green shirt now fell asleep in a car.
